body_html: @beyhangl I'm not sure how you installed TensorFlow. However, if you used the pip install command, you need to call pip install tensorflow-gpu to get the GPU version; pip install tensorflow will install the CPU-only version.
body_text: @beyhangl I'm not sure how you installed TensorFlow. However, if you used the pip install command, you need to call pip install tensorflow-gpu to get the GPU version; pip install tensorflow will install the CPU-only version.
body: @beyhangl I'm not sure how you installed TensorFlow. However, if you used the `pip install` command, you need to call `pip install tensorflow-gpu` to get the GPU version; `pip install tensorflow` will install the CPU-only version.
